app.title: TrueMBTI
test.title: MBTI Test for {firstName}
test.question: Question {number} of {total}
result.title: Wecome, {name}!
result.description: {count} {count, plural, one {individual} other {individuals}} took the MBTI test on behalf of {name}.
mbti.description.INFP: Idealistic, staying loyal to their values and the people they cherish.
mbti.description.ENFP: Warmly enthusiastic and imaginative, seeing life as full of possibilities.
mbti.description.ENTP: Quick-witted, inventive, and outspoken, constantly generating stimulating ideas.
mbti.description.ISTJ: Quiet, diligent, and dependable, achieving success through thoroughness and reliability.
mbti.description.ISFJ: Quiet, friendly, and deeply responsible, devoted to their duties and othersâ€™ well-being.
mbti.description.INFJ: Intuitive and empathetic, seeking meaning in relationships and ideas while guiding others toward positive growth.
mbti.description.INTJ: Original thinkers with great drive, focused on implementing ideas and achieving strategic goals.
mbti.description.ISTP: Observant and adaptable, acting swiftly to solve problems when they arise.
mbti.description.ISFP: Quiet, friendly, sensitive, and kind. Enjoy the present moment, what's going on around them.
mbti.description.INTP: Curious and analytical, constantly developing logical explanations for the world around them.
mbti.description.ESTP: Pragmatic and action-oriented, adaptable to immediate results with a flexible approach.
mbti.description.ESFP: Energetic and spontaneous, embracing life with enthusiasm and a love for experiences.
mbti.description.ESTJ: Practical and decisive, staying committed to structure, order, and their responsibilities.
mbti.description.ESFJ: Caring and sociable, devoted to supporting others and fostering harmony in their communities.
mbti.description.ENFJ: Warm, outgoing, and empathetic, driven to help others realize their potential.
mbti.description.ENTJ: Bold leaders with original ideas, motivated to turn visions into reality.
shareable.findOutMore: Find out your true MBTI at truembti.com
home.title: Discover Your True MBTI
home.description: Understand your personality by having your friends and family take the test for you.
howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1.title: Sign Up
howItWorks.step1.description: Once you sign up, you'll gain access to a dashboard where your MBTI results are updated in real time.
howItWorks.step2.title: Generate Link
howItWorks.step2.description: Create a unique test link for your friends or family members to fill out for you.
howItWorks.step3.title: Share
howItWorks.step3.description: Send the link to someone who knows you well to take the test for you.
howItWorks.step4.title: Analyze
howItWorks.step4.description: See your MBTI results get updated in real-time.
result.thankYou: Thank you for taking the test for {name}! Your results have been saved and shared.
result.signUp: Sign Up to Know My True MBTI
signup.title: Sign Up for TrueMBTI
signup.description: Use your Google account to sign up and find out your True MBTI.
notFound.title: Page Not Found
